com.github.nwillc.tostring

Class FieldAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nwillc.tostring.FieldAccessor

  • public final class FieldAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class providing, via reflection, access to fields of an object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,?> getField(java.lang.Object instance, java.lang.String fieldName)
      Retrieve a specified fields value.
      static java.util.stream.Stream<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,?>> getFields(java.lang.Object instance)
      Via reflection, return all the fields declared by the object provided.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getFields

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,?>> getFields(java.lang.Object instance)
        Via reflection, return all the fields declared by the object provided.
        Parameters:
        instance - the object to list the fields of
        Returns:
        a stream of name value pairs of the fields and their values

      • getField

        public static java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,?> getField(java.lang.Object instance,
                                                               java.lang.String fieldName)
                                                        throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        Retrieve a specified fields value.
        Parameters:
        instance - the object to retrieve the field from
        fieldName - the name of the field to retrieve
        Returns:
        a name value pair of the field and its value
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - if field is not declared by the object
